div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio
eiusdem quinto die mensis Octobris Anno Domini millesimo
quadringentesimo nonagesimo quinto quo die Sectis vocatis et curia
affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo Sectarum

Eodem die Alexander chamer de murchile electus fuerit in officium
prepositure pro anno Instanti prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Alexander chamer thomas fif Andreas culan senior
et thomas leslie electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno Instantj
prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Andreas nacthy Jacobus
leis et henricus orvm electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum pro
anno Instantj prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die continuantur decisones plegiorum porrectorum per
priorem fratrum predicatorum dicti burgi et contradictio per magistrum
Alexandrum fif et plegiorum collectorum capellanorum collegij de Abirdene
et procuratorem domini de barnys de et super recuperacione quorundam terrarum
per processus vsque ad duodecim diem Octobris propter debilitatem
curie absque preiudicio parcium

Eodem die Johannis Johannes Scherar' accedens ad barram protestatus fuit
In forma Juris pro vno annuo Reddito xiiij s' sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente ad finem orientali vici caustri extra portam
inter mortem caustri et australi ex vna et communionem venellam qua Itur
ad futy ex boriali partibus ab altera ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Johanne Ramsay
Roberto bovar et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad berram barram dominus Andreas henricj capellanus
et procurator altaris beati nicholaij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu trium solidorum sibi annuatim debit'
de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis culan ex australj et terram Johannis
colisone ex boriali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia
tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus forsy Dauidsone Roberto
Kintor et Andrea nachty sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Dauid liell procurator Alisone
liell et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sex
solidorum et octo denariorum sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico superiori ecclesie infra dictum burgum ex australi parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam thome Waus ex orientali ex vna
et terram henricj tuldef ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram
quondam Duncanj clat versus austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boriam
ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo gibsone
Johannes lorimer' Willelmo mernys et Jacobo leis sergeando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus matheus nicholsone collector
et procurator capellanorum collegij de Abirdene et protestatus fuit
in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu xiij s' iiij d' dictis capellanis
annuatim debito de vno crofto quondam Richardj Kintor Jacente in territorio
croftorum de Rubislaw inter
ad quam terram siue croftum accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in curia tanquam
primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo gibsone Johanne lorimar
et Jacobo leis sergeando

Eodem die Johannis Johannes blabir' legittime vocatus non comparuit responsurus
plegio super ipsum alias per patricium leslie porrectum Igitur precipitur
philippo Dunbrek seriando ad capiendum districtum ab eodem et eundem
ad plegium demitti si petatur et dictum Johannem premunire hodie et ad
quindenam et cetera tanquam 3o die huius processus

Eodem die accedens ad barram patricius leslie procurator domini
de barnis et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu sibi
domino de barnis debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente in le futy
inter terram Andree murray Judicatoris ex australi ex vna et terram quondam
thome broyssouris ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram Accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentavit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus testibus thoma blak
Johanne sclatar et Jacobo leis seriando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Robertum Waus
Capellanum ac procuratorem altaris Sancte marie magdalene deductis
de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis
in vico nauium ex australi orientali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis
blak ex orientali ex vna et terram patricij andirsone ex occidentali partibus
ab altera in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus xxtj s' a longo
tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus dominus Robertus per procuratorem suum dominum
Andream gray peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis
Juris and Justicie Complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata
decreuit quod dictus dominus Robertus procuratorio nomine quo supra proprietatem et possessionem
dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus
Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatorum Curie datum fuit
pro Judicio teste Curia Insuper dictus dominus Andreas peciit Instrumentum
presentibus Alexandro chamer de murchil preposito Alexandro menyeis Roberto blinsele
Alexandro Rede thoma prat Andrea branche Willelmo blinsele Willelmo
Kintor et philippo Dunbrek seriando

The saide day thomas chamer talyour grantit him avinge to William
lammyntone j barrel of Salmond quhilkis he oblist him to pay to the
said William within xv dais hereftir be the fatht of his bodie

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum matheum nicholsone procuratorem et collectorem capellanorum collegij
de abirdene de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis ex
occidentali parte vie regne qua Itur a Cimiterio Sancti nicholaij ad le bolbrig
inter terram olim Johannis gothtrasone ex ex australi et terram fratrum predicatorum ex boreali
et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et torrentem Denburne versus occidens in defectu solucionis
annuj redditus quinque s' dictis capellanis a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus procurator
nomine procuratorio quo Super peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et iusticie
complementum Tunc curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dictus procurator nomine procuratorio quo super proprietatem et
possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperavit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj Redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis
Williamsone Judicatoris Curie datum fuit pro Judicio teste Curia

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
nono die mensis Octobris Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo quinto

Dauid menyeis
dominus Johannes ruthirfurd
Alexander menyeis
Robert blinsell
Alexander Rede
Jonhne of Cullane
Jonhne Colisone
Thomas prat
Androw branche
Jonhne menyeis
James Colisone
gilbert menyeis
Androw murray eldar
Jonhne Wormet
Dauid mathesone
Williame blinsele
Alexander gray
Alexander mar'
Robert Crag
William futhes
Thomas Waus
Thomas mar'
William Kintor

Willelmus andirsone senior
Willelmus murray
Jacobus Craik
Robertus evinsone
Jacobus Kennartj

Evin quartar philippus Dunbrek seriandus
Willelmus Spruce et laurencius talyour'
Crukit quartar Andreas nachtj seriandus
georgius forstar et Johannes fynne
grene quartar
futy quartar Jacobus leis seriandus
Richardus talyour et hugo tode

The saide day It was statut ande ordanit be the consale that nay swyne
salbe haldin within the burgh vteuth' bande ande within fiftene dais to be
Removit the burgh or in bande Ande the Joysaris of the saide swyne to
pay viij s' for the amerciament of the court and the saide swyne to be eschet
and' thaj be comprehendit vteuthe bande the saide fiftene dais beinge
runnyn thaj beand' fundin in ony mannis skath

The saide day It was statutit ande ordanit be the consal that nay
burges be maide within this burgh' for thre yeris next tocum except
burges sonnis ande thaj that mareis burges douchtiris les' nay
for x li' Ande gif the aldirman for the tyme happinnis to mak ony
burges sale pay x li' for his fredome / to the tone'

The saide day it was statut and ordanit ande ordanit be the
consall that ale forstallaris in the burgh and vteuthe salbe
accusit for forstallin of the burgh' ande punyst tharfor eftir the
lovabile' consuetude ande statutis of this burgh'

The saide day it was statut and odanit'ordanit that ale chepmen bering
salt ande merchandice apone thar bakis sal haue fre fredome
tocum pas' ande repas' in and fra the saide burgh' without ony
accusacion' or perell of forstallin of this burgh'

The saide day It was statut and ordanit that ale baxteris
vssinge bakin within this burgh' sale haue reddy bakin bred'
freche clene weile bakin of gud and sufficient flour' contening
xxxvj vncis the tua penny layf for ij d' the penny laif
contening xviij vncis the half penny laif ix uncis reddy to be
sauld to ale personis quhome it efferis

The saide day it was statut and ordanit be the consale that nay
aile salbe brewin within this burgh' for this yer' darrar' thane
vj d' the galone' vndir the pane' of law Ande the fre folkis to
brew thar' aile for vj d' the galone' Ande vnfre for iiij d' the
galone'

The saide day is was statut and ordanit that ale candilmakaris
within this burgh' sal haue reddy candill to Sell to ale personis
weill maide small wekyt ande dry tile Illuminanat Illuminat and schew
lycht the punde of maide candillis contening the wecht to be sauld'
for iij d'

The saide day It was statut and ordanit that thar salbe ane
prewe Inquest takin to cers' ale vnsufficientis personis hous'
wattiris Infectouris drauchtis haldaris ande ale vthir poyntis
concerning the prewey Inquest

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit that nay litsteris bakaris
blextaris nor' craftismen suld wesche thar' clathis hiddis skinnis
nor' vthir stuf in the commone' Revollis lochis nor' ande wattiris
And' nay fische quhit nor' Red clathis' nor' foule vyle nay
Infectit stuf be weshin nor' castin in the samyn Ande that nay
drauchtys be haldin one the said wattiris bot vtirly to be
distroit

The saide day It was statut ande ordanit be the consall
that ane persone halde the haile commone' gattis and venellis
of Abirdene clene and weill dichtit be the sicht of the tovne
for the quhilkis he sall haue ane penny of Ilkane fyr' hous'
ane penny of Ilkane marchand' butht ande craftismen buthis

add.del: Judicium processus per dominum Robertum Waus
